venue.name: The Corner of Nira Ave and Day Street

item.description:
Dear cyclists and Urban Wilds enthusiasts and advocates,

Please join us next Saturday, July 14th for a tour of some of Jamaica Plain and Roslindale's most stunning Urban Wilds. We will start out in JP near Hyde Square and then head by the pond, over to Hellenic Hill, through Allandale, peek into Roslindale Wetlands and come out through Bussey Brook. You will learn about each of these Urban Wilds along the way. There will be a few hills but we will take it slow and stick together. It should be a fun morning. Please spread the news to all of your biking friends and those who love to discover wild in the city. Bring your bike and helmet.

Call to RSVP and I hope to see you there,

Karen
item.how_to_find_us: We will be waiting there with our bikes
item.name: Jamaica Plain and Roslindale Urban Wild Bike Ride
